export default function Landing() { return (

We envision to change the taboo nature of sex that creates a tremendous barrier for those trying to get help and end up believing there’s nothing they can do. We believe sex is present in most of our lives, why not enjoy it and embrace our sexuality. For this Neudify is taking a pragmatic approach, by giving people something they can easily understand, feel comfortable watching, and at an affordable price.

Neudify is different than other digital wellness platforms, not only in content but in approach, this is an individual experience to get in touch with yourself, through your mind, body, and spirit.

Our content includes informative courses, personalized health tracking, simple visuals, all while incorporating a mindful approach. We are challenging gender stereotypes and traditional phrasing. With so much conflicting content online regarding sexual strategy or reproductive health, we want to be a trusted source for a variety of information. We’re challenging what it means to be good in bed- pushing satisfaction, communication, and pleasure to the forefront for everyone. We believe there is a space for everyone in the sex-ed conversation.

Neudify will define the next generation of sexual education- sensual exploration in the information era. Our platform should encourage curiosity while clarifying the taboos of sexual education, all while sustaining a sleek and comfortable user experience. We want to encourage users to consider sexual wellness as a part of their own perception of health and wellbeing.

); }
